= KindEditor 4.0 API =

TODO

core functions:
 * KE(expr, settings) - init and create editor
 * KE.create(id) - create editor
 * KE.remove(id) - remove editor
 * KE.show(id) - show editor
 * KE.hide(id) - hide editor
 * KE.design(id) - change to design mode
 * KE.source(id) - change to source mode
 * KE.save(id) - save html to element value
 * KE.html(id, html) - get/set html
 * KE.text(id, text) - get/set text
 * KE.selectedHtml(id, html) - get/set selected range
 * KE.selectedText(id, text) - get/set selected range
 * KE.editable(id, bool) - flag: true or false
 * KE.resize(id, width, height) - resize editor

event handlers:
 * KE.oninput(id, handler) - for input events
 * KE.onchange(id, handler) - for input events
 * KE.onclick(id, handler) - for click events
 * KE.onfocus(id, handler) - for focus events
 * KE.onblur(id, handler) - for loses focus events
 * KE.onresize(id, handler) - for resize events
 * KE.oncreate(id, handler) - for create events
 * KE.onremove(id, handler) - for remove events
 * KE.onshow(id, handler) - for show events
 * KE.onhide(id, handler) - for hide events
 * KE.onsave(id, handler) - for save events
 * KE.ondesign(id, handler) - for design events
 * KE.onsource(id, handler) - for source events

{{{
examples:
// by default settings
KE('#textarea_id');
// by custom settings
var editor = KE('#textarea_id', {
    width : '700px',
    height : '400px'
});
editor.create();
editor.remove();
KE.create(editor.id);

}}}
